title: Trump authorises release of oil from US reserves after Saudi attack
text:
President Donald Trump announced on Sunday that he has authorised the release of oil from US strategic reserves after drone attacks cut Saudi Arabia's crude production by half.

[WASHINGTON] President Donald Trump announced on Sunday that he has authorised the release of oil from US strategic reserves after drone attacks cut Saudi Arabia's crude production by half.

"Based on the attack on Saudi Arabia, which may have an impact on oil prices, I have authorised the release of oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve, if needed, in a to-be-determined amount," Mr Trump tweeted.

AFP
description: : THE BUSINESS TIMES Energy & Commodities - [WASHINGTON] President Donald Trump announced on Sunday that he has authorised the release of oil from US strategic reserves after drone attacks cut Saudi Arabia's crude production by half. . Read more at The Business Times.
